script.name: Lib.Gen.Anarkis.Pirate.Trade.AddProducts
script.description: Pirate Guild - Add new products to the PB

line.comment: * Trade : Add random products to a PB
* LU Update (Solarahawk): updated wares for LU
* $max = [THIS]-> get max amount of ware $ware that can be stored in cargo bay
* Save array of installed wares on THIS pirate base

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Add new products to the PB
Trade : Add random products to a PB
LU Update (Solarahawk): updated wares for LU
$max = [THIS]-> get max amount of ware $ware that can be stored in cargo bay
Save array of installed wares on THIS pirate base
